articles.title: YouTube's AI-powered 'Jump Ahead' feature rolling out widely to Premium users - Android Authority
articles.description: YouTube Premium subscribers in the US can now try out the new AI-powered Jump Ahead feature that lets them skip to the best parts of a video.
articles.content:
• YouTube Premium members in the US can now try out the new Jump Ahead feature on the platform.
  • It uses AI to let you jump to parts of a video where most viewers typically skip ahead.
